entities.name: harry

entities.name: malfoy

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: A person who has been killed, as mentioned by Malfoy.

relationships.description: Malfoy is holding Harry tightly, which hurts him.
Harry's friend Ron mentions that Crabbe is dead, implying that Harry may have killed him.
Ron harshly tells Malfoy that Crabbe is dead.
